Task 1.Trends: Description of identified trends in text format. Include any periods of increase or decrease, and specify any notable patterns observed.
Task 1.Anomalies: Description of any anomalies or notable observations in text format. Mention any unusual spikes or drops in prices.

Task 2.Summary: Summary of findings in text format. Focus on factors influencing supply and demand, such as geopolitical events, weather conditions, or economic policies.
